name: WeatherWizz
0:
”Alexa ask my weather station the outdoor temperature”
”Alexa ask my weather station the indoor temperature”
”Alexa ask my weather station the humidity”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my weather station
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask Alexa for your personal weather station for the garden or outdoor temperature, humidity, air pressure, rain or even rain this month. Link your WeatherWizz dashboard account to your Amazon account and now you can just ask! An audible dashboard for your personal weather station makes it even easier to find out your temperature at home while you are away, just ask!
